sprint_goal: Establish the foundational secure transformation engine and the core security model (encryption and RBAC) for script management.
Deliver the full CRUD interface for managing transformation scripts, including the rich editor and robust error handling.
Implement the interactive script preview feature and the comprehensive audit trail for compliance and security.
Add advanced script management features like versioning and comparison, and implement system stability guardrails.
Focus on operational readiness, monitoring, documentation, and delivering remaining 'Should Have' and 'Could Have' features.
